title: Set the Annual League Schedule
description: A league administrator needs to generate the entire schedule for the upcoming season, balancing team travel and broadcast preferences.

tasks.description: Input all constraints into the scheduling software, including venue availability, team travel rules, and key broadcast dates.

tasks.expected_outcome: The software produces a complete, conflict-free draft schedule.

tasks.description: Send the draft schedule to teams and broadcast partners for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent distributes the draft for feedback.

tasks.description: After making minor adjustments based on feedback, publish the final, official schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finalizes and publishes the season schedule.
